item.title: Grappen over Russen en Rusland
item.description: Trevor Noah: Vinyl Backwards Uit Some Languages Are Scary (2018). Louis C.K: A Really Crazy Place Over de keer dat Louis C.K. als twintiger naar Rusland ging. Het was 1994. â€˜Somebody told me that the Wall had just come down in the Soviet Union and that Russia was a really crazy place at the time.
